info.name: Darker YouTube
info.description:
YouTube styled in Dark Grays, clean and easy on the eyes. 
There's no need to choose the dark theme in YouTube (no need to be logged in or save cookies).
Matching the other skins in the "Darker" series. 

EnjoY!
info.additionalInfo:
Support: https://www.zigboom.com

Matching Styles: 

https://userstyles.org/styles/43463/darker-google
https://userstyles.org/styles/100480/darker-facebook

More User Styles: https://userstyles.org/users/24480

data.title: gr8 one, nice n simple, minor issue(s)
Great work! But you've missed a spot...
Text boxes on subscriptions page have white backgrounds.
